sentence.Network_en: Your red - rimmed eyes reveal that you have been crying.
sentence.Network_cn: 你眼圈红红的说明你哭过了.

sentence.Network_en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentence.Network_en: His exercise books were full of well deserved red ticks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的练习本上尽是些红钩钩，都是他应得的。

list.abs: 常见的装饰方法有: red cherry on glass rim 小樱桃桂杯 red cherry with pick 酒签穿小樱桃 olive with pick 酒签穿橄榄 onion with pick 酒签穿小洋葱.
red-rimmed eyes , eg from weeping眼眶发红（如因哭泣)
when the red rim of the sun edged over the horizon , he began shooting .当红色的太阳刚刚在地平线上露头的时候，他就开始拍照了。
Bubbles in the cup " red rimmed green " is the top grade tea ., 泡于杯中 " 绿叶红镶边 " , 是乌龙茶之上品.
